column4: hi i have installed apache2 and when i type localhost in the browser it isn't opening nothing :S i tried installing xampp but same again please help me!!!???:(
i type localhost and it says connecting to localhost.. i tried to up apache on the live cd and it worked :S
so what have you done to install it?
did you install it from source or used packages?
sudo apt-get install apache2.. sudo apache2ctl start
my computer name is localhost teo@localhost:~ can that mean someting??
you might try editing /etc/apache2/httpd.conf and add ServerName localhost at the ent...
my httpd.conf was empty and i add ServerName localhost but same again:S ????
i tried to up apache2 on live cd with same commands and it worked.. :S when i install ubuntu it cant work :S
what does sudo apache2ctl fullstatus give you?
nothing i type that and it
nothing i type that and it isnt doing anything...
i get this w3m: Can't load http://localhost:80/server-status.
i get this w3m: Can't load http://localhost:80/server-status.
